title: Ineos Grenadiers Is Looking for Its Next Tour de France Winner in the USA
content:
Ineos Grenadiers partners with US devo team Hot Tubes: 'This will expand our talent search and provide a pathway for American riders to U23 and the WorldTour.'

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Is Looking for Its Next Tour de France Winner in the USA on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
